title: Omnicom Group 's revenue 2006 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, and finally roughly increasing from 2013 to 2014.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 15.32 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 11.72 was reported at Year 2009
